analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x91967e9d60f297d77d360efca3854455cc9b1437.sol:
	Contract ERC20Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x91967e9d60f297d77d360efca3854455cc9b1437.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x91967e9d60f297d77d360efca3854455cc9b1437.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
